=== Introduction ===

This specification discusses the feature set which will comprise the 1.0 release of the Soyuz module of Launchpad. We will cover both the features of the web interface for Soyuz and the backend tools and scripts for managing the archives and auto builders.

See the launchpad wiki https://wiki.launchpad.canonical.com/SoyuzOneDotZero
